Uses of Interface
org.omg.PortableInterceptor.Current

  • Packages that use Current 
    Package Description
    org.omg.PortableInterceptor
    Provides a mechanism to register ORB hooks through which ORB services can intercept the normal flow of execution of the ORB.

    • Uses of Current in org.omg.PortableInterceptor
